answers.answer: Hope that doesnt happen to me. :(
Im hoping it happens to me lol

question: Update on my friend that had a boy when she was told a girl. So all together she had 7 ultrasound and 3 DVDs!! Because of her diabetes she was high risk. The whole time they were looking at the back of the baby balls and thought it was vagina lips lmao!!! Anyway she had a beautiful 10lbs 3 oz baby boy and she is right now still in the hospital. He is dressed in hospital clothes until her husband exchanges all the pink for blue.
title: update on wrong gender
